thread.title: FullContact Appoints Tim Prunk as President and COO

author: cnbc.com
title: FullContact Appoints Tim Prunk as President and COO
text:
Data industry leader to serve as senior executive for customer data company
DENVER--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- FullContact announced today the appointment of storied data industry leader Tim Prunk as the company’s President and Chief Operating Officer (COO). Prunk brings extensive transformational marketing knowledge and operational expertise to complement the FullContact leadership team.
“We’re thrilled to have Tim with us. His background will help us achieve our mission - to enable our customers to make relationships better,” said Bart Lorang, FullContact CEO. “Tim’s knowledge of data-driven marketing and prowess in the data industry align perfectly with our company and make this a great fit for our leadership team.”
“Companies can significantly improve their business results by focusing first on delivering real value for each consumer and by relentlessly using data insights to deliver a personalized and engaging customer experience,” said Prunk. “With the FullContact global platform and extensive global data assets, there’s a huge opportunity to help companies know their customers in new and unique ways and enrich each customer relationship.”
Prunk previously led the Global Marketing Groups for Epsilon and Conversant. Prior to his time at Epsilon, he was the founding president of InfoBase, Acxiom’s highly regarded data business. He has also held leadership positions at MatchLogic, Customer Development Corporation, National Demographic and Lifestyles and The Polk Company. Prunk is a frequent speaker and advisory board member at marketing events globally. In 2015, Prunk was a recipient of the DMCNY Silver Apple Award for career achievement in direct marketing.
Prunk’s appointment to the FullContact executive leadership team reflects the organization’s dedication to provide world-class industry expertise to help companies “be awesome with people.” Prunk will lead an aggressive high-growth strategy for sales, marketing, product development, data strategy and engineering.
About FullContact
Founded in 2010, FullContact, Inc. offers industry-leading Customer Intelligence APIs which enable companies to unlock the benefits of understanding their customers and prospects holistically. For more information about achieving enrichment with the highest levels of data quality and security, please visit www.fullcontact.com .
